      • assertPropertyEquals

        public static void assertPropertyEquals(Properties props,
                        String key,
                        String expected)
        Assert that a property in the property set matches the expected value
        参数:
        props - property set
        key - property name
        expected - expected value. If null, the property must not be in the set

      • writeAndRead

        public static void writeAndRead(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                byte[] src,
                int len,
                int blocksize,
                boolean overwrite,
                boolean delete)
                         throws IOException
        Write a file and read it in, validating the result. Optional flags control whether file overwrite operations should be enabled, and whether the file should be deleted afterwards. If there is a mismatch between what was written and what was expected, a small range of bytes either side of the first error are logged to aid diagnosing what problem occurred -whether it was a previous file or a corrupting of the current file. This assumes that two sequential runs to the same path use datasets with different character moduli.
        参数:
        fs - filesystem
        path - path to write to
        len - length of data
        overwrite - should the create option allow overwrites?
        delete - should the file be deleted afterwards? -with a verification that it worked. Deletion is not attempted if an assertion has failed earlier -it is not in a finally{} block.
        抛出:
        IOException - IO problems

      • writeDataset

        public static void writeDataset(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                byte[] src,
                int len,
                int blocksize,
                boolean overwrite)
                         throws IOException
        Write a file. Optional flags control whether file overwrite operations should be enabled
        参数:
        fs - filesystem
        path - path to write to
        len - length of data
        overwrite - should the create option allow overwrites?
        抛出:
        IOException - IO problems

      • toChar

        public static String toChar(byte b)
        Convert a byte to a character for printing. If the byte value is < 32 -and hence unprintable- the byte is returned as a two digit hex value
        参数:
        b - byte
        返回:
        the printable character string

      • downgrade

        public static void downgrade(String message,
             Throwable failure)
        downgrade a failure to a message and a warning, then an exception for the Junit test runner to mark as failed
        参数:
        message - text message
        failure - what failed
        抛出:
        org.junit.internal.AssumptionViolatedException - always

                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                   String text,
                   boolean overwrite)
                            throws IOException
        Write the text to a file, returning the converted byte array for use in validating the round trip
        参数:
        fs - filesystem
        path - path of file
        text - text to write
        overwrite - should the operation overwrite any existing file?
        返回:
        the read bytes
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO problems

        抛出:
        IOException - IO problems during file operations

      • dataset

        public static byte[] dataset(int len,
             int base,
             int modulo)
        Create a dataset for use in the tests; all data is in the range base to (base+modulo-1) inclusive
        参数:
        len - length of data
        base - base of the data
        modulo - the modulo
        返回:
        the newly generated dataset

      • assertListStatusFinds

        public static void assertListStatusFinds(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dir,
                         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path subdir)
                                  throws IOException
        Assert that a FileSystem.listStatus on a dir finds the subdir/child entry
        参数:
        fs - filesystem
        dir - directory to scan
        subdir - full path to look for
        抛出:
        IOException - IO probles
